title: Guidance
content:
ance can be applied dynamically during dice rolls by clicking on the Add Bonus icon at the bottom of the screen. Differences from D&D 5th Edition: In 5E, guidance only affects one ability check during the duration rather than all of them.

Cantrips Acid Splash ♦ Blade Ward ♦ Bone Chill ♦ Dancing Lights ♦ Eldritch Blast ♦ Fire Bolt ♦ Friends ♦ Githyanki Psionics: Mage Hand ♦ Improved Minor Illusion ♦ Light ♦ Mage Hand ♦ Minor Illusion ♦ Poison Spray ♦ Produce Flame ♦ Ray of Frost ♦ Resistance ♦ S
